title: ADRENALINE (1990) Special Edition DVDR
description:
ADRENALINE Special Edition [DVD-R]

Short films/Horror | 1990 | France
Directed by John Hudson, Alain Robak, Yann Piquer, ... 

"Adrenaline" is a collection of short surrealist films presenting an interesting mix of gore, cynical humor and absurd. It was selected at the 1990 Fantastic Film Festival of Avoriaz. It remains officially unreleased on DVD to this day. This bootleg DVD presents the film in the best quality available (opt. English subtitles included) along a rare interview with two of the directors.

Film source : original 1st generation VHS rip, remastered.
DVD bonus material : Interview with 2 of the directors, printable DVD cover. 

Video : DVD-5 | .iso image | PAL | 720x576 | 4:3 | 1.66:1 aspect ratio
Audio : Original French Stereo 2.0 | AC3 | 448 kb/s
Subtitles : English [optional]
Runtime : 01:10:38
DVD size : 3,4 gb

More information and screengrabs on my blog. (URLS cannot be posted on ThePirateBay, search for "Dr Sapirstein Fan Edits/Preservations" on Google)
